greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Factorization of n! into primorials.
comment: Factorial of n has a unique representation as a product of primorials: n! = 2#^T(n,1)*3#^T(n,2)*...*P_{Pi(n)}#^T(n,Pi(n)).
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jan 26 2006
